simple. Do what any respective GM would d, adopt the cahrachters into their 
own and try to spread them amongst players. Heh If I was a council member i'd 
do it. I've GMed a few years so I know what to do and when to do it. Right 
now the RPG is losing people left and right and that needs to be stopped.

--part1_44.17a85ebc.2946d9db_boundary
